ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual
ygData.msgSnippet: It runs, but not well for any kind of a raid. Everyone in my guild that has upgraded to 512 RAM, is very happy with the improved performance. So I will be
ygData.messageBody:
It runs, but not well for any kind of a raid. Everyone in my guild that
has upgraded to 512 RAM, is very happy with the improved performance. So I
will be upgrading soon myself. Seems like 512 RAM is more of a necessity
than an option.

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>


<tt>
You just described my 2 systems.  How does SoL run on yours?  I
will be<BR>
upgrading both to 512RAM and from what I have read here so far, that<BR>
seems to be the biggest help (and the cheapest, regular SDRAM is very<BR>
inexpensive right now).<BR>
<BR>
Shada<BR>
<BR>
-----Original Message-----<BR>
From: John Grady <BR>
<BR>
(PIII 733, 256MB, GForce2 MX 64MB, iDSL connection).<BR>
</tt>

<br>
